# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

ll isprime[100001],squarefree[100001],factors[100001];
vector<ll> prime;
int main()
{

	isprime[0]=isprime[1]=1;
	for(ll i=1;i<100001;i++)
	{
		if(!isprime[i])
		{
			prime.push_back(i);

			for(ll j=0;i*i+j*i<100001;j++)
				isprime[i*i+j*i]=1;

			ll num = i*i;

			for(ll j=1;num*j<100001;j++)
				squarefree[num*j]=1;

		}

		for(ll j=1;j*i<100001;j++)
			factors[i*j]+=i;
		

	}	

	//while(1)
	{
		ll n;cin>>n;
		cout<<factors[n]-n<<endl;
	}


}
